briefdescription.para: Function returning the current total power (in W) emitted by the source body.
Function returning the current position of the source body.
Function returning the current position of the target body.
Radiation pressure coefficient of the target body.
Function to reset a constant radiation pressure coefficient of the target body.
Reflecting area of the target body.
List of functions returning the positions of the bodies causing occultations.
List of radii of the bodies causing occultations.
Radius of the source body.
Current radiation pressure due to source at target (in N/m^2).
Current vector from the target to the source.
Current time of interface (i.e. time of last updateInterface call).

memberdef.argsstring: (const std::function< double() > sourcePower, const std::function< Eigen::Vector3d() > sourcePositionFunction, const std::function< Eigen::Vector3d() > targetPositionFunction, const double radiationPressureCoefficient, const double area, const std::vector< std::function< Eigen::Vector3d() > > occultingBodyPositions=std::vector< std::function< Eigen::Vector3d() > >(), const std::vector< double > occultingBodyRadii=std::vector< double >(), const double sourceRadius=0.0)
memberdef.name: RadiationPressureInterface

briefdescription.para: Constructor.

detaileddescription.para:
Class construtor for radiation pressure interface.
sourcePower
Function returning the current total power (in W) emitted by the source body.
sourcePositionFunction
Function returning the current position of the source body.
targetPositionFunction
Function returning the current position of the target body.
radiationPressureCoefficient
Reflectivity coefficient of the target body.
area
Reflecting area of the target body.
occultingBodyPositions
List of functions returning the positions of the bodies causing occultations (default none) NOTE: Multiple concurrent occultations may currently result in slighlty underestimted radiation pressure.
occultingBodyRadii
List of radii of the bodies causing occultations (default none).
sourceRadius
Radius of the source body (used for occultation calculations) (default 0).

memberdef.argsstring: (const std::function< double() > sourcePower, const std::function< Eigen::Vector3d() > sourcePositionFunction, const std::function< Eigen::Vector3d() > targetPositionFunction, std::function< double(const double) > radiationPressureCoefficientFunction, const double area, const std::vector< std::function< Eigen::Vector3d() > > occultingBodyPositions=std::vector< std::function< Eigen::Vector3d() > >(), const std::vector< double > occultingBodyRadii=std::vector< double >(), const double sourceRadius=0.0)
memberdef.name: RadiationPressureInterface

briefdescription.para: Destructor.
Base class function to update the current properties of radiation pressure.

detaileddescription.para:
Base class function to update the current properties of radiation pressure. This function is nominally called by the updateInterface function, which may be overridden by derived classes.
currentTime
Time at which acceleration model is to be updated.

briefdescription.para: Function to update the current value of the radiation pressure.

detaileddescription.para:
Function to update the current value of the radiation pressure, based on functions returning the positions of the bodies involved and the source power.
currentTime
Time at which acceleration model is to be updated.

briefdescription.para: Function to return the current radiation pressure due to source at target (in N/m^2).

detaileddescription.para:

briefdescription.para: Class in which the properties of a solar radiation pressure acceleration model are stored.

detaileddescription.para: Class in which the properties of a solar radiation pressure acceleration model are stored and the current radiation pressure is calculated based on the source power and geometry. The current implementation is limited to a cannonball model.
